page.title: 12EDUCATION IN DELABOLE
page.content: { Parent-Teacher Association. The P.T.A. has provided the school with many extras: the swimming pool, changing rooms for boys and girls, the B.B.C. computer, and most recently, play equipment in the school field. David Barrett writes about the {Sponsored Walk}to raise funds for the play equipment:"When I got to the first check point I had a drink of orange.Then I kept on running until I got to the second check point I tipped a cup of water over my head.Then I had two of my sweets until I got to the other check point.There I didn't have a drink at all.When I got to the fourth check_point I tipped another cup of water over my head.When I got to the last check point I just had a glass of water and went back to the school to have a hot_dog."
